hero.heading: Your Checklist
hero.copy: Here's a checklist of things to consider before heading into a store. Fill it out, print it, make notes on it and take it with you.

instruction.title: Pro Install
content: A professional will accurately measure your patio doors for you.
You don't have to worry about accidentally voiding your warranty.
We'll clean up the mess and dispose of your old patio doors for you.

instruction.title: Measurements
content: Doing it yourself? You can add your patio door sizes below.
We recommend taking photos of your patio doors and bringing them along. Selfies are welcome.

link.text: How to measure your patio doors

next.heading: Ready to talk patio doors? So are we.
